scripts.deploy: aws s3 rm s3://primes.tinyrobot.co --recursive && aws s3 cp build s3://primes.tinyrobot.co --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --profile prime-generator-prod
scripts.deploy:ci: aws s3 rm s3://primes.tinyrobot.co --recursive && aws s3 cp build s3://primes.tinyrobot.co --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive
